CommentBody:
On Escalation Ticket # 00422291 the Following Fields have been updated: 
Status has been changed to Awaiting Escalating Engineer.

On Escalation Ticket # 00422291 the new comment has been added: Krzysztof Staszalek:

@WaitingOnEngineer 

In future any of FR should be raised only in Product Boards.
Request refused, as we have already such functionality in webUI: please refer to user manual: https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EndpointProtector_5.9.4/page/Content/EndpointProtector/Admin/SystemConfiguration/SecurityAndSettings.htm#advanced_user_password_settings

Based on that System Security ->  Advanced User Password Settings  where they can Enforce Complex Password and set the Minimum password length is configurable.

fyi @Cristian-Alexandru Halmajan @Cecilia-Maria Iepure @Peter Rooney  @Stacy Petruzzi
